DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Stimulation Upper Limb Training Individuals With Sequelae From Intracranial Hemorrhage
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : To investigate effect anodal transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) upper limb training individual sequelae intracranial hemorrhage . Design : Triple-blinded randomise control trial Study population : Patients intracranial hemorrhage ( ICH ) non-traumatic aetiology . Between 6 month five year injury . Intervention : Group 1 receive five day upper limb occupational therapy combination anodal stimulation Group 2 receive five day upper limb occupational therapy combination sham stimulation The intervention take place patient ' home address . Assessment tool : Patients complete Jebsen Taylor Hand Function Test baseline , post-intervention 7 day follow-up .
